events.name: Codaisseur Demo Night
events.description: This is the best demo night you have ever seen. It's a-m-a-z-i-n-g. Seriously. Lets make a dent in the universe.

events.name: New Years Eve
events.description: It's going to be wait for it.

comments.author: Eric
comments.body: After one look at this planet any visitor from outer space would say “I WANT TO SEE THE MANAGER.”

comments.author: Billy
comments.body: I'm always relieved when someone is delivering a eulogy and I realise I'm listening to it.

comments.author: Pete
comments.body: A good lawyer knows the law; a clever one takes the judge to lunch.

comments.author: Anna
comments.body: Men are simple things. They can survive a whole weekend with only three things: beer, boxer shorts and batteries for the remote control.

comments.author: Leon
comments.body: People always told me be careful of what you do And dont go around breaking young girls' hearts And mother always told me be careful of who you love And be careful of what you do cause the lie becomes the truth.

comments.author: Leo
comments.body: I like to wax my legs and stick the hair on my back. Why? Because it keeps my back warm. There's method in my madness.

comments.author: Yke
comments.body: If I roll once and you roll twice. What does that mean?

comments.author: Zorita
comments.body: Sometimes I wonder if I really can. But then I think to myself, maybe I can't. But if I could, that would be good. Maybe it's all a lie?
